column4: checked with my ISP... ubuntu.com seemes to be the problem. right now I can't reach ubuntu.com even with firefox - no wonder apt-get update fails. Can anybody confirm please?`Otherwise I have to check with my ISP again
i'm downloading stuff from security.ubuntu.com right now; www.ubuntu.com is working too
maybe a router of my ISP runs wild... other sites work perfectly, internal net is fast and stable - just www.ubuntu.com refuses to anwer...
all i can say is it's working from here
